items.title: Pregnant British teen freed from Georgia jail after drug smuggling charge
items.description: The 19-year-old from Teesside, who was charged with drug trafficking, is eight months pregnant.

items.title: Israeli military's ex-top lawyer arrested as scandal over video leak deepens
items.description: Maj Gen Yifat Tomer-Yerushalmi resigned on Friday, admitting leaking the video allegedly showing abuse of a Palestinian detainee.

items.title: Australian mushroom murderer appeals against convictions
items.description: Erin Patterson is serving a life sentence for killing three relatives with a toxic mushroom meal.

items.title: Rail security to be reviewed after train stabbings
items.description: Transport Secretary Heidi Alexander says there could be more facial recognition CCTV after a mass stabbing on a train.

items.title: I don't see streaming as the competition, says Vue cinema boss
items.description: Tim Richards said the likes of Netflix and Apple TV are complementary rather than damaging for the big screen.
